dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description:
An analysis tool providing insight into the portability and
maintainability of an application's source code.
dependent_to.name: py-codebasin

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: metrics for Python, C, C++, Go and Javascript code
dependent_to.name: py-metrics

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

description:
pathspec extends the test loading and running features of unittest,
making it easier to write, find and run tests.
name: py-pathspec

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
